bibl.title: Papyrus Egerton 5: Christian or Jewish?
bibl.note: P. Egerton 5 (= van Haelst 921). Text, interpretation and translation. The prayer should be regarded as Jewish. The closest parallels derive from one specific Jewish prayer, namely the Amidah. Nevertheless national elements which would have made the prayer immediately recognizable as Jewish are absent.
bibl.seg: VAN DER HORST Pieter W., Papyrus Egerton 5: Christian or Jewish?

P. Egerton 5 (= van Haelst 921). Text, interpretation and translation. The prayer should be regarded as Jewish. The closest parallels derive from one specific Jewish prayer, namely the Amidah. Nevertheless national elements which would have made the prayer immediately recognizable as Jewish are absent.
